mapper.select: select vbs.* from view_board_status vbs left join view_board_info vbi on vbs.view_board_info_id = vbi.id where vbi.view_board_type = #{freedViewBoardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into view_board_status (id, view_board_info_id, view_board_status_name_id, current_status_quantities) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{viewBoardInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{viewBoardStatusNameId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{currentStatusQuantities,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into view_board_status
id,

current_status_quantities,

update view_board_status
view_board_info_id = #{viewBoardInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
